703010f-a.title: Brooklyn: Atlantic Avenue - Columbia Place
703010f-a.text:
Atlantic Avenue, north side, east from the East River
to Columbis Place, across Furman Street. 1he trucks are
waiting for the ferry which operates from the foot of
Atlantic Avenue to Jersey City, New Jersey. 1he first of
the three buildings at the N.W. corner of Furman Street
was torn down (view 2).
P. L. Sperr  View 1: April 29, 1935
NO RERODUCTIONS  View 2: October 15, 1940
703010f-a.folder: Atlantic Avenue & Columbia Place, Brooklyn, NY
